channel.title: CVE Feed for Kashipara Group -- Hotel Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kashipara Group -- Hotel Management

item.title: CVE-2023-49270|2024-08-02T21:53:44.653Z -- kashipara%20group -- hotel%20management
item.description: Hotel Management v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple authenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities. The 'check_in_date' parameter of the reservation.php resource is copied into the HTML document as plain text between tags. Any input is echoed unmodified in the application's response.

item.title: CVE-2023-49271|2024-08-02T21:53:45.462Z -- kashipara%20group -- hotel%20management
item.description: Hotel Management v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple authenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities. The 'check_out_date' parameter of the reservation.php resource is copied into the HTML document as plain text between tags. Any input is echoed unmodified in the application's response.

item.title: CVE-2023-49272|2024-08-02T21:53:44.990Z -- kashipara%20group -- hotel%20management
item.description: Hotel Management v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple authenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities. The 'children' parameter of the reservation.php resource is copied into the HTML document as plain text between tags. Any input is echoed unmodified in the application's response.

item.title: CVE-2023-49269|2024-08-02T21:53:45.107Z -- kashipara%20group -- hotel%20management
item.description: Hotel Management v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple authenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities. The 'adults' parameter of the reservation.php resource is copied into the HTML document as plain text between tags. Any input is echoed unmodified in the application's response.
